title: 231: Link's Apology | Ear Biscuits Ep. 231
description:
An on-air mistake, a heartfelt dialogue, and the word that never existed. Link opens up about a recent conversation he had with his old babysitter's granddaughter and how it has changed the way he will conduct himself from here on out on this episode of Ear Biscuits!

(1:51) - a story of confrontation
(5:46) - R's morning mishap
(18:38) - the word that never existed
(27:53) - an emotional FaceBook message
(35:02) - Link's apology
(42:44) - a heartfelt response with an unexpected turn
(1:01:22) - just yourself be if quare is you
(1:06:17) - Link's rec
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
